text: Mumu () is a Russian tale. It was published in 1852 by Ivan Turgenev in the political magazine: Sovremennik. The story is about the relationship between Gerasim - a deaf mute servant - and his dog. The story changes to an elderly widow-woman who is Gerasim's boss. The woman shows her cruel side when she tells him to get rid of his pet. ==Related pages== * Ivan Turgenev * Russian literature == References == == Other websites== * Oreshin K., История рассказа "Муму".
